definition: anti-aircraft fire/to shoot at enemy planes
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: Witnesses saw Taliban anti-aircraft guns across the city begin firing into the night sky.
sentences.chinese: 目擊者看見塔利班在全城的防空武器開始對空射擊。

sentences.english: Police fired shots in the air and teargas to disperse the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 警察對空射擊，並釋放催淚瓦斯以驅散人羣。
